CustomField.description: Date for which the dated currency exchange rate actually applies, even if it is being used for a broader date range. Currency conversions would always look for most recent rate that is not in the future (i.e. today or earlier).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Date for which the dated currency exchange rate actually applies, even if it is being used for a broader date range. Currency conversions would always look for most recent rate that is not in the future (i.e. today or earlier).
CustomField.label: Effective Date
